      • getExecutor

        protected abstract java.util.concurrent.Executor getExecutor()
        Provide an executor for sending events

        This method is only called after the constructor is completed

        Returns:
        the executor to use, must never return null

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Dispose the service.

        This method still needs a valid executor using getExecutor().
